scripts.deploy: npx pkg index.js && mv index-macos resumeExe && mv resumeExe ~/desktop/resumes

name: @pgmccullough/resume-entry
description: Simple application for a friend who needed to be able to take multiple PDFs of resumes, and have a CSV generated with the name, email address, and phone number of each applicant. The resumes come from a single source and are all almost identically formatted, making this possible.
